description: Members of the States Assembly voted in favour of the St Helier site, expected to be in open by 2026.
title: Overdale approved as new Jersey hospital site
title_page: Overdale approved as new Jersey hospital site - BBC News
maintext: The chamber agreed a report should be published considering sustainable ways of improving access to the site, while minimising the effect on nearby homes and facilities. Following a separate amendment, the government will also need to publish more details by March 2021, including costs and how the proposals have been affected by Brexit and the Covid pandemic.
